name: Mogul Mountain
description:
Ding!

Mogul themed high score challenge.

Test your endurance as you plummet the summit while clearing Moguls !

  • Use timing to pivot into each Mogul and improve your best score
  • Become a pro and achieve the Platinum Medal
  • Compete against your friends and peers via Game Center on iOS!

The Global Mogul Elite is a group comprised of 2 known indivuals who have achieved a score of 459 or above.
